Displaying Service Assemblies

When you select a service assembly node in the left pane, the right pane displays a graphical view of the service assembly. The graphical view shows the service units, the web service endpoints, and the connections between the endpoints.

Note - To display the graphical view correctly, you must have a Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) viewer installed.

Each box represents a service unit that has been deployed to a service engine or binding component.

To display service assemblies

  • In the left pane, select a service assembly.

    The right pane displays a graphical view of the service assembly.
